title: Love the Villain - Novel Updates
tags: Alchemy   Ancient Times   Cold Protagonist   Cultivation   Early Romance   Genius Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Mpreg   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Seme Protagonist   Sword Wielder   Time Skip   Transmigration
author: 玚瑷
description:
[Xianxia, villain, sweet pet, top protagonist, alchemist]
Liu Mufeng drowned and accidentally crossed into a novel he was reading.

The original owner was a stepping stone for the heroine, a small character who was murdered by the male protagonist and the female lead.

In order to live well, Liu Mufeng can only do everything possible to change his destiny as a stepping stone.>
